level.text: The purposes of Sections 557 through 563 are to:
Implement the District Department of the Environment’s stormwater fee discount program;
Reduce the volume of stormwater runoff from properties in the District of Columbia; and

Comply with the requirements of the Comprehensive Stormwater Management Enhancement Amendment Act of 2008, effective March 25, 2009, as amended (D.C. Law 17-371; D.C. Official Code §§ 8-152.01 et seq.).
